ai.summary: London LOOP (Section 10) is a 9.4 km moderately challenging segment of the London LOOP, a circular long-distance path around London. This section combines urban paths, parkland, and light woodland, offering a varied and accessible hike suitable for walkers with moderate fitness.
ai.terrain_summary: A mixed surface route with paved urban sections, gravel and grassy trails, and short woodland segments. Expect gentle rises and some uneven ground; surface conditions can be slippery when wet.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for UK weather variability and shorter daylight in winter. Wear sturdy, grippy footwear and dress in layers. Stay on marked paths, watch for cyclists on shared sections, and carry a map or offline navigation. Bring water and a light snack, a small first aid kit, and a charged phone; leash pets where required and clean up after them.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are ideal; the route can be hiked year-round with proper clothing and caution regarding weather

seo.title: London LOOP Section 10 – 9.4 km Moderate Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore London LOOP Section 10, a 9.4 km moderate hike around London blending urban paths with parkland and light woodland. Practical tips, safety notes, and gear.
